Class CreateAppointmentController

java.lang.Object
Controller.CreateAppointmentController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class CreateAppointmentController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
The CreateAppointmentController class is the controller to create Appointments.

      private boolean appointmentCheck(String appointmentTitle, String appointmentDescription, String appointmentLocation, String appointmentID) throws SQLException
      Checks that combo boxes are not empty and that the fields have the correct information entered
      Parameters:
      appointmentTitle - String variable for appointment title
      appointmentDescription - String variable for appointment description
      appointmentLocation - String variable for appointment location
      appointmentID - String variable for appointment id
      Returns:
      Boolean true if information is correct and false if it is incorrect
      Throws:
      SQLException

      endTime - LocalTime variable for the end time
      Returns:
